results.title: Simvastatin inhibits hepatic stellate cells activation by regulating the ferroptosis signaling pathway.

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ inhibits @<m>DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@hepatic stellate@@@ cells activation by regulating the ferroptosis signaling pathway.

results.title: Nano delivery of simvastatin targets liver sinusoidal endothelial cells to remodel tumor microenvironment for hepatocellular carcinoma
results.text_hl: LSEC capillarization is associated with fibrotic @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@ progression and poor survival in both @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@ model and @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@. We further found @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ restores the quiescence of activated @<m>DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@hepatic@@@ stellate cells (aHSCs) via stimulation of @GENE_KLF2 @GENE_16598 @@@KLF2@@@-@CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@NO@@@ signaling in LSECs, and up-regulates the expression of @GENE_CXCL16 @GENE_66102 @@@CXCL16@@@ in LSECs.

results.title: Pretreatment of simvastatin on liver trace element levels during endotoxemia.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ partially smaller @<m>DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@liver damage@@@ by increasing zinc levels during @DISEASE_Endotoxemia @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@endotoxemia@@@.

results.title: Effects of metformin and simvastatin treatment on ultrastructural features of liver macrophages in HFD mice.
results.text_hl: Both @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduced the @<m>DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@liver damage@@@ in HFD fed animals, manifested as the prevention of @DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@nonalcoholic steatohepatitis@@@ development and reduced activation and number of macrophages in the liver, as well as the percentage of these cells with @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ droplets in the cytoplasm compared to untreated HFD animals.

results.text_hl: However, combining @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@ with coQNPs and SeNPs resulted in severe @<m>DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@liver and muscle damage@@@.

results.title: Safety of two different doses of simvastatin plus rifaximin in decompensated cirrhosis (LIVERHOPE-SAFETY): a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled, phase 2 trial.
results.text_hl: Three (19%) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg/day group developed @<m>DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@liver and muscle toxicity@@@ consistent with @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@.

results.title: A systematic review on sex differences in adverse drug reactions related to psychotropic, cardiovascular, and analgesic medications
results.text_hl: Some serious ADRs were also found to exert sex difference pattern, such as @CHEMICAL_Clozapine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003024 @@@clozapine@@@ induced @DISEASE_Neutropenia @DISEASE_MESH:D009503 @@@neutropenia@@@ was more prevalent in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ whereas @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@/@CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@abnormal liver functions@@@ were more pronounced in @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@.
